attributes.action: ensure that the Ministry of Defence makes arrangements to inform all members of the armed forces that they must register annually to vote in elections, and that the attention of all servicement and women must be drawn to this fact, and it must be made possible for them to make arrangegements to vote in time for the forthcoming General Election..The Government must ensure that awareness is raised and that an appropriate deadline date set to facilitate registration in time for the May election. Therafter the requirement to register annually should be reviewed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All service personnel now have to register annually in order to be able to vote. Lack of knowledge of this fact and the unreasonable requirement to sign annually has resulted in the number of service personnel registering falling from 139,000 to 21,000. While preserving the right to democracy for other British citizens, our brave servicemen and women are in danger of not being able to exercise this right themselves. The USA and Canda have both ensured this with convenient online registration and voting.
